notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Percent change is calculated on unrounded data.
sources: Agencies' submissions to OMB per MAX Schedule C, agencies' budget justification documents, supplemental data obtained from agencies' budget offices, and Executive Office of the President, OMB, Budget of the United States Government, Fiscal Year 2025.
